name: ado-mode-test
short_description:
This was meant to be a simple test to see if and how sourceforge could be used to host the emacs ado-mode. Instead, it will be something that withers on the vine, because sourceforge.net will not allow deleting projects which are less than 90 days old, and will not allow deleting projects which have released files... and it was the latter I wished to test.

So... this project is nothingness and will remain nothingness until it is 90 days old, and I can request a deletion. Sorry.
summary: temporary posting of ado-mode for testing purposes
